comment._content: in 1934 ladies wearing pants? i didn't know that.thx. for posting it

comment.author: 53037461@N02
comment._content:
My late dad was a member of the Dutch football supporters group visiting Milan for the football match Netherlands - Switzerland, on May 27, 1934. The Dutch team lost 2-3.
My dad and his friend went sightseeing the next day and arrived at a place named Bellagio , situated on Lake Como. Because they were thirsty, they asked a local young lady for some water. That lady became my mother and passed away just last month at age 99! Her ashes were recently brought back to Bellagio from Holland. I stll have the commemorative medal event.

comment._content:
On this picture most of the football supporters are women! The man didn't want to have their picture taken?
Or does this say something about the football-culture in 1923? And what does it say about the gender-relationships?
